title: Discademia marketing website (blue & white) with intro and key service sections

requirements.text: Create a responsive, single-page marketing website for “Discademia” (online tutoring platform for O/A level students) with a professional blue-and-white theme applied consistently across typography, buttons, section backgrounds, and interactive states.

quotes: Make  a website for Discademia an online tutoring platform for students of 0/A levels.
Have a blue and white Professional theme.

acceptanceCriteria: Site renders as a cohesive, professional blue-and-white theme (primary blue, white backgrounds, accessible contrast).
Layout is responsive and readable on mobile, tablet, and desktop.
No user-facing text uses placeholder/lorem ipsum; all copy is in English.

requirements.text: Add a top navigation header with the Discademia brand and anchor links that scroll to each section: Welcome/Intro, 1:1 Tutoring, Faculty, Notes & Mark Schemes, Live Sessions.

quotes: make secions about 1:1 turtoring classes, introducing faculty, notes and mark scehemes, live sessions.

acceptanceCriteria: Header is visible at the top and works on mobile (collapsed menu or stacked links).
Clicking each nav item scrolls to the correct section on the page.
Active/hover styles match the blue/white professional theme.

requirements.text: Implement a Welcome/Intro hero section with inviting, professional messaging for Discademia, including a short headline, supporting paragraph, and primary call-to-action button (e.g., “Book a Free Consultation” or “Get Started”).

quotes: Add a welcome intro but make it inviting and professional.

acceptanceCriteria: Hero includes: headline, supporting text, and at least one CTA button.
Copy is inviting and professional, explicitly referencing O/A Level tutoring.
CTA button has clear hover/focus styles and is keyboard accessible.

requirements.text: Add a “1:1 Tutoring Classes” section describing personalized tutoring, subjects/coverage (without inventing specific subject lists unless framed generically), how sessions work, and key benefits in a scannable layout (cards or bullet points).
acceptanceCriteria: Section has a clear title “1:1 Tutoring Classes” (or equivalent) and concise descriptive copy.
Benefits/process are presented in a scannable format (e.g., 3–6 cards or bullet points).
Section is reachable from the top navigation anchor link.

requirements.text: Add an “Introducing Faculty” section that presents faculty profiles in a grid (e.g., 3–6 cards) with name, role/specialty, short bio, and optional credentials; keep copy professional and non-fictional (use generic placeholders clearly labeled as examples if real names are not provided).
acceptanceCriteria: Faculty section displays a responsive card grid with consistent spacing and styling.
Each card includes: name, role/specialty, and short bio text.
Content avoids making unverifiable claims; if placeholders are used, they are clearly indicated as sample profiles.

requirements.text: Add a “Notes & Mark Schemes” section describing availability of study notes and mark schemes, how students can use them, and what formats/support are offered (kept general unless specific formats are provided).
acceptanceCriteria: Section includes a clear title and short explanatory copy.
Section uses a structured layout (e.g., 2–4 feature cards) to communicate what’s included.
Section is reachable from the top navigation anchor link.

requirements.text: Add a “Live Sessions” section describing interactive live learning sessions, what students can expect (Q&A, exam practice, revision), and how to join (kept general; no external integrations required).
acceptanceCriteria: Section includes a clear title and professional, student-focused description.
Section visually matches the theme and uses a scannable layout (cards/bullets).
Section is reachable from the top navigation anchor link.

requirements.text: Add a footer with Discademia branding and simple contact placeholders (e.g., email and/or social links) without requiring external services; include a short tagline appropriate for an O/A Level tutoring platform.

quotes: Make  a website for Discademia an online tutoring platform for students of 0/A levels.

acceptanceCriteria: Footer appears on all screen sizes and matches the overall styling.
Footer contains at least: brand name, short tagline, and contact placeholders (non-functional is acceptable).

requirements.text: Add the required generated static images to the frontend as static assets and render them in the appropriate sections (logo in header/footer; hero illustration in the intro). Store generated images under frontend/public/assets/generated (no backend image routing).

quotes: Make  a website for Discademia... Have a blue and white Professional theme.

acceptanceCriteria: Generated images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated and are referenced directly by the frontend.
Discademia logo is displayed in the header and footer.
Hero illustration is displayed in the welcome/intro section and scales responsively without distortion.

constraints: Frontend files under immutable paths must not be edited directly: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Use English for all user-facing text.
Do not add third-party authentication providers; Internet Identity only (if authentication is introduced later).
No external databases or third-party backends; keep the site as a static marketing experience unless explicitly expanded.
nonGoals: Implementing user accounts, login, or student dashboards.
Building booking/payment flows or Stripe integration.
Implementing real-time live session video/chat features (only marketing content for live sessions).
Uploading/downloading notes/mark schemes from the backend.

required: Discademia logo, clean academic style, blue on white (discademia-logo.dim_512x512.png)
Hero illustration featuring a student studying with subtle academic icons, minimal modern vector style, blue-and-white palette (discademia-hero-illustration.dim_1600x900.png)
